definitions.text: a formal entry into an organization or position or office
examples: he was ordered to report for induction into the army
he gave a speech as part of his installation into the hall of fame

definitions.text: an electrical phenomenon whereby an electromotive force (EMF) is generated in a closed circuit by a change in the flow of current
reasoning from detailed facts to general principles
stimulation that calls up (draws forth) a particular class of behaviors
examples: the elicitation of his testimony was not easy

definitions.text: the act of bringing about something (especially at an early time)
examples: the induction of an anesthetic state

definitions.text: an act that sets in motion some course of events
